subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Czech Republic overcame the arrival of Alex Ovechkin to beat Russia, 3-2, and improve its record to 4-0 at the world championships in Kosice, Slovakia.
snippet: The Czech Republic overcame the arrival of Alex Ovechkin to beat Russia, 3-2, and improve its record to 4-0 at the world championships in Kosice, Slovakia.
